FlavorTextOption.Text: "We have no pressing ship construction needs right now."
"We should construct more military ships to aid in our war efforts."
"Our military is weak. We should increase military ship production so we do not appear to be easy targets."
"Our colonies could use more protection from stationed ships."
"We should build colony ships to claim additional worlds into our civilization."
"Much of the galaxy remains a mystery to us. We should build some probes to learn about our surroundings."
"There are anomalies we could be surveying, if we had more survey ships at our disposal."
"We should build more constructor ships, so that we can use starbases to expand our control."
